name: Hell Immigration
description:
Welcome to the First Court of Hell! You had accepted a job offer to help sort the incoming souls into their well-deserved punishment zones as the current king is too busy with... something. 

Goals:

Hit the daily quota of providing the correct stamps within the given time. There are a total of 9 days, divided into 3 different levels.

Controls:

Mouse-Only! (To stamp the book, drag and drop the stamps)

This game is a creative project made for a mythology study, the Chinese Afterlife Myth to be specific. This game is also inspired by the mechanics of the game "Papers Please" and the lore from the Ten Courts of Hell in Haw Par Villa.

Last note: For a better experience, play the downloadable build. For the web build, the ending stops at a black screen instead of closing itself.
